summary: The diff does not show any changes to the actual "Onboarding Incomplete" screen or its "Start Onboarding" button. Instead, it adds onboarding-step reset logic in `Onboarding.tsx` and adds a `handleStartOnboarding` navigation handler in `WeeklyMountain.tsx`, but there is no evidence the onboarding-incomplete CTA is fixed or that a stable `data-testid` was added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the Onboarding Incomplete screen CTA so clicking "Start Onboarding" always navigates to `/onboarding` reliably (not a no-op), works on repeated clicks, and is not blocked by redirects/loading/stale handlers; no unintended redirect back to `/weekly-mountain` while onboarding-incomplete.
missing_requirements.reason: No diff evidence shows edits to the Onboarding Incomplete screen or its "Start Onboarding" button wiring. The only navigation-to-`/onboarding` handler shown is in `WeeklyMountain.tsx`, and `Onboarding.tsx` changes do not demonstrate fixing the CTA on the onboarding-incomplete screen itself.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a stable `data-testid` attribute to the "Start Onboarding" button on the Onboarding Incomplete screen that is unique and not dynamic.
missing_requirements.reason: No `data-testid` addition is shown anywhere in the provided modified files, and no Onboarding Incomplete screen file is included/modified in the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Add a "Start Onboarding" click handler in `WeeklyMountain` that navigates to `/onboarding` with `replace: true`, plus additional debug logging.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is specifically about the "Onboarding Incomplete" screen CTA and adding a `data-testid` there; it does not request changes to the Weekly Mountain page or a new handler there.

hallucinated_features.description: Reset onboarding flow to step 1 on component mount with a console log in `Onboarding.tsx`.
hallucinated_features.reason: While related to ensuring onboarding starts at step 1 after navigation, the BuildRequest does not ask for a mount-reset behavior change; it only asks to fix the Onboarding Incomplete screen button navigation and add a `data-testid`.
